title: Beale Street Sign
content:
Trying to figure out what "Beale St" is set in. Any ideas?

Thanks in advance!

 Bernhard Bold

comments.content:
Bernhard Bold Condensed [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bernhard/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113954/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bernhard/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bernhard/") Also sold under the name Bernhard Antique [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/bernhard-antique/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113954/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/bernhard-antique/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/bernhard-antique/")  
Also available from Bitstream, Paratype, etc.  
Designed by Lucian Bernhard for Bauersche Giesserei in 1912.  
Don
